review: I'm in love with this game, if I could play this game with my friends and there were more objective based activities I would most surely play this game to much!So far this game is beautiful, minimal graphical glitches other than the ground going mental now and then. I would say most poloshed Alpha game thus far!

review: I felt like I was a little child playing this game, I was scared to even turn a corner ^_^. You know those times where you're told not to do something so your mind automatically wants to do it? yeah not a good idea in this game unless you wanna go to the bathroom after!
